thread.title: Crashes when working with patches in Prey editor

post.author: Danabacken
post.body:
Hi! Would appreciate help on this one.

I just installed Prey, but can't use the editor. Playing the game works fine. And opening the editor and messing around a little works fine as well. But when I start messing with patches, the editor crashes a minute after.

I've had this problem before, and solved it by installing older drivers for my radeon graphics card. But now I can't find the really old drivers from the ati.com website.

So, the question is;

Does anyone know where to get the Radeon 9800 pro drivers from early 2006? Or do you know any other way to solve this problem?

Thanks in advance
